Header: US Voluntary Resources personnel due in the island to conduct a Course on English Language
Content: Another group of the Voluntary Resources personnel of the US is due in the island. The purpose of their visit is to conduct a Course on English Language within Sri Lanka. They will be arriving in the island at the invitation of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. Agreement has been expressed for the launch of voluntary programmes of the US Peace Force within Sri Lanka. The bilateral agreement in this respect is expected to be inked in February next year. It is planned to implement the programme in collaboration with the Education Ministry. The group will include 100 voluntary resource personnel. Studies will commence in the year 2020. The launch of the service of the US Peace Force again will lead to a growth in friendly ties between Sri Lanka and the United States.
